Powers.DescLong: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
You perform a quick punch that deals moderate damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

This melee attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a good chance to Disorient the target. This power will have a 100% chance to stun and weaken the target's secondary effects and regeneration rate if used while in Energy Focus mode. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit.  Recharge: Long

Powers.DescShort: Melee (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Disorient, Special
Powers.DescLong: You focus your internal energy on your fists, and release it once you hit your target uneashing an energy wave that hurts and disorients multiple enemies. This power will hit up to 5 additional foes if used while in Energy Focus mode. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Fast

By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Powers.DescShort: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, +Energy Focus
Powers.DescLong: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This melee attack is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. This power will enter Energy Focus mode. Total Focus Criticals do not result in double damage, instead it grants double Energy Focus. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Powers.DescShort: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP, Special
Powers.DescLong: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Energy Transfer Criticals do not result in double damage, instead the self-damage becomes a self-heal. This power will execute extremely quickly if under Energy Focus mode. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Moderate
